00537 // KEYBOARD MATRIX HANDLING ROUTINE, ADDED BY CLAUDIO
00538 
00539 
00540 
00541 /* 
00542 
00543 
00544 
00545 KEYBOARD BIT MAP
00546 
00547 ----------------
00548 
00549 This is the bit number in the 64-bit keymatrix.
00550 
00551 Bit set means key is pressed.
00552 
00553 
00554 
00555     A]-+  B]-+  C]-+  D]-+  E]-+  F]-+  
00556 
00557     |41|  |42|  |43|  |44|  |45|  |46|
00558 
00559     +--+  +--+  +--+  +--+  +--+  +--+  
00560 
00561 
00562 
00563     G]-+  H]-+  I]-+        UP]+        
00564 
00565     |47|  |53|  |54|        |49|      
00566 
00567     +--+  +--+  +--+  LF]+  +--+  RT]+  
00568 
00569                       |50|  DN]+  |52|
00570 
00571     J]-+  K]-+  L]-+  +--+  |51|  +--+  
00572 
00573     |55|  |57|  |58|        +--+    
00574 
00575     +--+  +--+  +--+                    
00576 
00577 
00578 
00579     M]--+  N]--+  O]--+  P]--+  BKS]+
00580 
00581     | 33|  | 25|  | 17|  | 09|  | 01|
00582 
00583     +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+
00584 
00585 
00586 
00587     Q]--+  R]--+  S]--+  T]--+  U]--+
00588 
00589     | 34|  | 26|  | 18|  | 10|  | 02|
00590 
00591     +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+
00592 
00593 
00594 
00595     V]--+  W]--+  X]--+  Y]--+  /]--+
00596 
00597     | 35|  | 27|  | 19|  | 11|  | 03|
00598 
00599     +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+
00600 
00601     
00602 
00603     AL]-+  7]--+  8]--+  9]--+  *]--+
00604 
00605     | 60|  | 28|  | 20|  | 12|  | 04|
00606 
00607     +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+
00608 
00609     
00610 
00611     RS]-+  4]--+  5]--+  6]--+  -]--+
00612 
00613     | 61|  | 29|  | 21|  | 13|  | 05|
00614 
00615     +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+
00616 
00617     
00618 
00619     LS]-+  1]--+  2]--+  3]--+  +]--+
00620 
00621     | 62|  | 30|  | 22|  | 14|  | 06|
00622 
00623     +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+
00624 
00625     
00626 
00627     ON]-+  0]--+  .]--+  SP]-+  EN]-+
00628 
00629     | 63|  | 31|  | 23|  | 15|  | 07|
00630 
00631     +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+  +---+
00632 
00633 
00634 
00635 */

00849 // MACROS TO CREATE KEYBOARD MASKS
00850 
00863 #define KB_MASK64(a) (((ULONGLONG)1)<<(a))
00864 
00865 
00866 
00881 #define KB_MASK32(a) (((unsigned int)1)<<(a&31))

00884 
00899 #define KB_MASK8(a)  (((unsigned int)1)<<(a&7))

00907 
00908 
00927 #define KB_CURS ((ULONGLONG)0x001e000000000000)

00929 
00930 
00931 // USE WITH HIWORD ONLY
00932 
00951 #define KBH_CURS32 ((unsigned int)0x001e0000)

00954 
00955 // ALL FUNCTION KEYS (A-F)
00956 
00975 #define KB_FUNC ((ULONGLONG)0x00007e0000000000)
00976 
00977 // USE WITH HIWORD ONLY
00978 
00997 #define KBH_FUNC32 ((unsigned int)0x00007e00)

01043 // KEYMATRIX TYPE DEFINITION
01044 
01061 typedef union {
01062 
01063         ULONGLONG full;
01064 
01065         struct { unsigned int loword,hiword; };
01066 
01067         unsigned char bytes[8];
01068 
01069 } keymatrix;
